globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.google.com https://maps.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; frame-src https://www.google.com https://maps.google.com;
